Entry.Name: Protocols compliance
Entry.Description: Report of elements for {sheet} to achieve compliance against {guidelines} guidelines

Mitigation.Textual:
The following protocols were added to the server configuration:{add}
Remove the following protocols from the server configuration:{remove}
Mitigation.Apache: The directive that handles these elements inside the configuration is SSLProtocol. The separator for this directive is a whitespace and to disable an element can add - in front of it.
Mitigation.nginx: The directive that handles these elements inside the configuration is ssl_protocols. The separator for this directive is a whitespace and to disable an element can add - in front of it.
